issue.title: Allow Pages to be marked as published or not
issue.body: When the site is generated we should exclude any Content that has a FrontMatter attribute `published` with a value set to false. By default this value should be true and only if the value is explicitly set to false will the content be excluded. This would apply only to dynamic content as static assets don't get a front matter applied.

issue.title: Add event listener for when a Content is generated and written
issue.body: It is expected there might be desired functionality that allows for programmatically adjusting a piece of Content before it is written and to fetch the final output of a Content after it is written. To facilitate this a new event listeners should be created and added to the Engine that triggers every time a piece of content is generated and written, respectively.

issue.title: Add support for loading JSON files in the data directory into the KeyValueStore
issue.body:
Although there's a way to add data to the `KeyValueStore` programmatically with the `DataProvider` it would also be helpful if static JSON files were loaded into the `KeyValueStore` before each build.

A new `SiteConfiguration` value should be added which specifies the data directory. Before any programmatic data providers are ran each JSON file in the data directory gets merged into the `KeyValueStore`. Only top level keys are merged in and each key is namespaced by the name of the file. For example, given the following directory structure:

```
/data
  foo.json
  bar.json
```

Assuming that both of these files store a JSON object that looks like the following:

```
{
  "foobar": "<some value>"
}
```

After the key value store is loaded each key can be accessed by calling `KeyValueStore::get('foo/foobar')` and `KeyValueStore::get('bar/foobar')` respectively. By namespacing the values stored from the data directory we can ensure that duplicate keys don't conflict and override each other.
